documents.document: FIFA: “The kid who was signed on a napkin.” #DeadlineDay https://t.co/xa39grHLht
.@ivanrakitic: “I'd travel to the moon just to play with Messi.” #SuperBlueBloodMoon https://t.co/BIm6c5JWFt
.@RayHudson [on Leo's 265th @LaLiga goal]: “Messi takes the moon and all the planets into consideration before he detonates this one.” #SuperBlueBloodMoon

.@Forbes: “Highest paid athletes [2005-2015];
$845m @TigerWoods $660m @FloydMayweather $475m @kobebryant $472m @KingJames $468m Phil Mickelson $455m @rogerfederer $441m David Beckham $432m @mannypacquiao $407m @Cristiano $350m Leo Messi.”
@nickphillipdunn https://t.co/FBsmr1f3IJ
.@willguyatt: “It's #DeadlineDay. I've just seen Lionel Messi driving around Nailsworth in a @BMW i3 — with my OWN EYES!”
.@brian_stormont: “Went out for a roll and Lionel Messi was buying a coffee in The Spar. United or Dundee bound?” #DeadlineDay

.@DenholmeUnited: “No #DeadlineDay deals at DUFC today. Plenty of players fishing for a move to Foster Park but unless your first name is Lionel (preferably Richie, but we'd take Messi), we're not interested...” #UpTheStags
.@CrossCountryUK: “Don here until 13:00pm answering your tweets. Then off to Sheffield to await the Owls' signing of Messi.” #DeadlineDay
.@ColwynBayFC: “Happy #DeadlineDay! Have you seen Messi drop his kids off at Eirias?”
.@Castle_Risingfc: “No #DeadlineDay business from us. However, we tried to get Messi to sign with an offer of a pint and plate of free chips.”
@brfootball https://t.co/ypiszRgToT
.@WhoScored: “Lionel Messi has won the WhoScored Man of the Match award in 20 of 27 @LaLiga and @ChampionsLeague appearances this season.” https://t.co/VzjOYBWOR0

.@MessiStats_: “A breakdown of Messi's 36 career free-kick goals by season;
1⚽ 2008/09 2⚽ 2009/10 1⚽ 2010/11 3⚽ 2011/12 6⚽ 2012/13 4⚽ 2013/14 2⚽ 2014/15 9⚽ 2015/16 5⚽ 2016/17 3⚽ 2017/18.” https://t.co/t9iITyeNNe

.@SuleyOzturk: “...Steven Berghuis or Nasser El Khayati. The statement, however, is not correct. We've become so accustomed to Messi's appearance that in his case we have consciously and unconsciously adjusted the standard.” (2/2) https://t.co/BJB0j0QeXd

.@SuleyOzturk: “Lionel Messi is often quoted on Dutch talk shows, when an Eredivisie player shows something special you often hear; ‘If Messi does this, we'd hear about it for weeks’. It's a note intended to emphasize how special a particular action is from, for example... (1/2)

.@SuleyOzturk: “The goals & assists are the exclamation marks after 90 minutes. They're repeated, collected and put one after another. Yet he is much more than a collection of stats & records. So much happens between the exclamation marks, that what he does is so hard to grasp!” https://t.co/Ue0U1vL4U5

.@SuleyOzturk: “It may sound a little strange, but Lionel Messi has ruined watching Lionel Messi. We would probably be blown out of our seat every time there was a possibility to erase the memory when it comes to Messi...and to re-live the moment with each game.” https://t.co/MU8S0RgnCh
.@SHAQALDINHO: “There isn’t another player anywhere close to his ability.” https://t.co/BBeXta8m5q
.@AdamJosephSport: “Leo Messi isn’t human. No words for the man at this point.” https://t.co/UuDy4VidoA

@andywest01 We agree. Amazing to think this quote was from almost 5 years ago. His greatness knows no boundaries. There aren't enough superlatives to describe his game. Looking forward to the project, Mr. West. https://t.co/qKODPhvoYj
.@SHAQALDINHO: “Messi sees the field better while he's playing than I can when I'm watching on TV.” https://t.co/wMRDi1CPFz
.@SHAQALDINHO: “I hate when people take stats like this of Messi and try to say this is what players need to do. There are different rules for this guy!” https://t.co/3EVyPKdOE5
RT @MessiQuote: .@philmcnulty: "Not much more you can say about Messi."
@andywest01 https://t.co/uCWXFHNayd
.@andywest01: “Barça fans should remind themselves every day how lucky they are to have spent the last 13 years watching Messi play for their team. Seriously.” https://t.co/LP3CodsdPp
.@COPA90US: “At this point, free kicks are just free throws for Messi. What an absurd little alien.” https://t.co/bO7EJqf8Uo
.@LaLiga: “Messi has now scored in five consecutive league games.” https://t.co/WqQT9CEy91
.@slavia_eng [after Leo scored his 534th goal for Barça]: “No doubts that Josef Bican was the ‘Messi of his time’. Even after decades he remains the legend!” https://t.co/bHLRjq42pB

@EltonGotosa @caughtoffside Always a pleasure...
https://t.co/7rFBtQnEJ9

.@RayHudson [on Leo's 534th goal for Barça]: “Like playing poker with a witch, you're gonna lose. Too much space & time for him to adjust all the gyroscopes in that head of his, & again he makes the ball defy the laws of physics. He knows the laws, but the laws don't know Messi!” https://t.co/AFTurJQ6CG
